Description_lang: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1/-1000}.1 sec|r, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.

description_blz.en_US: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by 5.0 sec, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.
description_blz.es_MX: El tiempo de reutilización de Guardián de los antiguos reyes se reduce 5.0 s, y lanzarlo hace que tu siguiente Palabra de gloria no cueste poder sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Guardião dos Reis Antigos tem a recarga reduzida em 5,0 s e faz com que sua próxima Palavra de Glória não custe Poder Sagrado.
description_blz.de_DE: Die Abklingzeit von 'Wächter der Uralten Könige' ist um 5,0 Sek. verringert und der Einsatz lässt Euren nächsten Einsatz von 'Wort der Herrlichkeit' keine Heilige Kraft kosten.
description_blz.en_GB: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by 5.0 sec, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.
description_blz.es_ES: El tiempo de reutilización de Guardián de los antiguos reyes se reduce 5,0 s y lanzarlo provoca que tu siguiente Palabra de gloria no cueste poder sagrado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit de 5,0 s le temps de recharge de Gardien des anciens rois, dont l’incantation annule le coût en puissance sacrée de votre prochain Mot de gloire.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il tempo di recupero di Guardiano dei Re Antichi di 5,0 s e lanciarlo azzera il costo in cariche di potere sacro della successiva Parola di Gloria.
description_blz.ru_RU: Уменьшает время восстановления "Защитника древних королей" на 5,0 сек. Следующее после его применения "Торжество" не требует энергии Света.
description_blz.ko_KR: 고대 왕의 수호자의 재사용 대기시간이 5.0초만큼 감소합니다. 또한 시전 시 다음 영광의 서약이 신성한 힘을 소모하지 않게 합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 遠古諸王守護者的冷卻時間縮短5.0秒，並且施放時會使你的下一個榮耀聖言不消耗聖能。
description_blz.zh_CN: 远古列王守卫的冷却时间缩短5.0秒，施放远古列王守卫后，你下一个荣耀圣令不消耗神圣能量。
